entries.description: DEPRECATION:  SAM actions using `python2.7` and `nodejs10.x` runtimes (Phase 2 Lambda deprecation)
SAM run/debug: The launch configuration options 'timeoutSec' and 'memoryMb' no longer apply to template or API targets
SAM/nodejs: do not check for "tsc" (typescript compiler) for plain javascript projects
SAM Debug Configuration Editor: All fields will persist after Save or Invoke action.
SAM: refresh timeout timer during build step
SAM/typescript: fix run/debug for target=code if source dir name has special chars
App Runner: fix issue with create wizard failing at the end after backing out of the select file dialog
SAM: `arm64` support (through SAM CLI's Architectures property) on select runtimes
Step Functions: Adds ability to render state machine graph from AWS Explorer.
Credentials: SSO profiles will reconnect on startup if the token is still valid
SAM run/debug: You can now change where SAM CLI builds your lambda by adding a 'buildDir' field to your launch configuration's "sam" section
UI: Toolkit statusbar now shows on the left and takes less space
Step Functions: enable visualizing ASL files in YAML (not asl-yaml) mode.
SAM/CFN schema support: avoid changes to user settings, improve reliability.
Adds Command Palette and CDK Explorer tree visualization capability for Step Functions state machines defined using the AWS CDK
SAM/typescript: search node_modules in the workspace for "tsc" typescript compiler
SAM Debug Configuration Editor: The UI has been updated to more closely match VS Code's style
